param.name: state
param.label: Published
param.description: Select publish status of the blog. Unpublished blogs will not be visible to the public.

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Select blog category. Select the category that best describes your blog.

param.name: access
param.label: Access Level
param.description: Select access to blog; all groups above that level will also have access to the blog.

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Input blog title. This is the title that will distinguish this blog from others. Suggested to input something unique and intuitive.

param.name: introtext
param.label: Blog Intro
param.description: Input HTML supported blog intro contents. Suggested to use minimal but well formatting for easy readability.

param.name: fulltext
param.label: Blog Full
param.description: Input HTML supported blog contents. Suggested to use minimal but well formatting for easy readability.

param.name: created_by
param.label: Owner
param.description: Input owner of blog as single integer user_id.
